description.p1: I'm a student at the Higher School of Computer Science and Digital Technologies (ESTIN), exploring both front-end and back-end development. On the front-end, I work with HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. On the back-end, I know a bit of Node.js and Express.js, and I've learned how to host websites.
description.p2: In college, I studied C programming and built a small project with it, which strengthened my problem-solving skills and gave me a solid programming foundation. I enjoy experimenting with different tools and languages to expand my knowledge.
description.p3: I'm still at the start of my journey, but I'm passionate about learning step by step, creating useful projects, and improving my skills. My goal is to build clean, functional, and user-friendly applications.

skills.adaptable_desc: I thrive in changing environments, quickly learning new tools and adjusting to evolving requirements.
skills.technical_desc: I have hands-on experience with modern web technologies, frameworks, and best practices to deliver high-quality solutions.
skills.problem_desc: I enjoy tackling complex challenges and finding elegant solutions through creative thinking.

squarespace_copy.name: Squarespace Copy
squarespace_copy.description: A recreation of the Squarespace layout and sections using React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

movie_app.name: Movie App
movie_app.description: A movie search and information app built to practice working with fetch and APIs, and to improve my skills in handling external data.

shoes_shop.name: Shoes Shop
shoes_shop.description: My first React app, built to learn the Framer Motion library and experiment with animating components.

designer_portfolio.name: Designer Portfolio
designer_portfolio.description: A simple portfolio site for a designer, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

my_portfolio.name: My Portfolio
my_portfolio.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, and Express.js, it also demonstrates some of my back-end knowledge. This is my first fully completed project.

music_app.name: Music App
music_app.description: A sleek and simple music player built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to explore audio features and user interface design.
